name: Rey HENRIQUEZ, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent of Sci Coal Township, Unit Manager D-Block B-Side Counselor, et al., Appellees

parties: Rey HENRIQUEZ, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent of Sci Coal Township, Unit Manager D-Block B-Side Counselor, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
50 A.3d 1255
Rey HENRIQUEZ, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent of Sci Coal Township, Unit Manager D-Block B-Side Counselor, et al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 20, 2012.
